thread.title_full: Great Deal 4 London - Review of Premier Inn London Hammersmith Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Chris_Ryan22
title: Great Deal 4 London -
text: Booked here for a one-night stay, visiting a nearby client business. Room rate quite acceptable, but then evening 2-course meal + a drink and all-you-can-eat breakfast the next morning for just Â£26 extra was not to be refused. Excellent mixed grill, tasty apple & plum crumble, but then the bed was maybe too comfy that I awoke late and had to rush breakfast! Thank you Premier Inn
